Ext.toolbar.TextItem Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.Toolbar.TextItem
  • Ext.toolbar.TextItem

[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.toolbar.TextItem Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Panel with TextItem',
        width: 300,
        height: 200,
        tbar: [{
            xtype: 'tbtext',
            text: 'Sample Text Item'
        }],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
